column1: Below a list of things that I expect to implement in the next version of WhatsApp module:
column2:
Below a list of things that I expect to implement in the next version of this module:
- remove the button on specific pages (eg: payment; login;)
- configure to display button for only selected groups
- create option to open whats with group message
- allow different whats numbers to subdivide service

If you have any other idea, please contact me in Mario SAM.
If you loved this FREE module, you also can help me with a donate in Patreon. Thank You!
